titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to enter into building leasing agreements.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Organization, Efficiency, and Financial Management .

committee.name: House Oversight and Government Reform
committee.subcommittee: Government Organization, Efficiency, and Financial Management

bill.summary: 6/24/2011--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture (USDA) to enter into certain building leasing agreements.
